name: grub-mkfont
body:
GRUB-MKFONT

NAME

grub-mkfont - make GRUB font files

SYNOPSIS

grub-mkfont [OPTION...] [OPTIONS] FONT_FILES

DESCRIPTION

Convert common font file formats into PF2
-a, --force-autohint

force autohint

-b, --bold

convert to bold font

-c, --asce=NUM

set font ascent

-d, --desc=NUM

set font descent

-i, --index=NUM

select face index

-n, --name=NAME

set font family name

--no-bitmap

ignore bitmap strikes when loading

--no-hinting

disable hinting

-o, --output=FILE

save output in FILE [required]

-r, --range=FROM-TO[,FROM-TO]

set font range

-s, --size=SIZE

set font size

-v, --verbose

print verbose messages.

-?, --help

give this help list

--usage

give a short usage message

-V, --version

print program version

Mandatory or optional arguments to long options are also mandatory or optional for any corresponding short options.

REPORTING BUGS

Report bugs to <bug-grub@gnu.org>.

SEE ALSO

grub-mkconfig(8)

The full documentation for grub-mkfont is maintained as a Texinfo manual. If the info and grub-mkfont programs are properly installed at your site, the command

info grub-mkfont

should give you access to the complete manual.
